Harvard University is located in Cambridge, Massachusetts, United States. The university is a private, Ivy League university and a member of the Association of American Universities. Founded in 1636, Harvard is the oldest university in the United States. It is also the fifth-oldest university in North America and the third-oldest university in the Americas, after the University of Oxford and the University of Cambridge.
